description: User requests a slide deck with speaker notes from a blog post; the assistant fetches the article, summarizes it, generates a slide deck, and adds speaker notes to each slide.

messages.content: You are ContentRepurposeAI, an agentic LLM that helps users transform blog posts into newsletters, social-media snippets, and slide decks with speaker notes while preserving brand tone.

Hi! Could you take my latest blog post at https://example.com/future-of-remote-work and turn it into a slide deck that includes speaker notes for each slide? I plan to present it to my team next week.
Sure, I’ll first retrieve the article content.

{"title": "The Future of Remote Work", "text": "Remote work has accelerated dramatically over the past few years, driven by advances in collaboration technology, shifting employee expectations, and global events. Companies are adopting hybrid models, investing in asynchronous communication tools, and rethinking office space. Key challenges include maintaining culture, ensuring equity, and managing productivity. However, the benefits—greater flexibility, access to a broader talent pool, and cost savings—are compelling. This article explores trends, best practices, and predictions for the next decade of remote work."}
Great, I’ve got the article. I’ll now create a concise bullet‑point summary that will serve as the backbone for the slide deck.

arguments.text: Remote work has accelerated dramatically over the past few years, driven by advances in collaboration technology, shifting employee expectations, and global events. Companies are adopting hybrid models, investing in asynchronous communication tools, and rethinking office space. Key challenges include maintaining culture, ensuring equity, and managing productivity. However, the benefits—greater flexibility, access to a broader talent pool, and cost savings—are compelling. This article explores trends, best practices, and predictions for the next decade of remote work.

messages.content:
- Remote work growth driven by tech, expectations, and global events
- Shift to hybrid models and re‑imagined office spaces
- Investment in asynchronous communication tools
- Challenges: culture, equity, productivity
- Benefits: flexibility, talent pool expansion, cost savings
- Best practices for managing distributed teams
- Future predictions for the next decade
I’ll turn the summary into a slide deck. Each bullet will become a slide’s main points.

arguments.title: The Future of Remote Work
key_points: Remote work growth driven by tech, expectations, and global events
Shift to hybrid models and re‑imagined office spaces
Benefits: flexibility, talent pool expansion, cost savings
Best practices for managing distributed teams
Future predictions for the next decade
